testCase.userPrompt: What are the most popular tourist attractions in Tokyo and what's the best time to visit them?

output.query: Tokyo tourist attractions best time to visit

results.title: Top 10 Tokyo Attractions - Japan Guide
results.snippet: Senso-ji Temple, Tokyo Skytree, Shibuya Crossing, and Meiji Shrine are among the most popular attractions. Spring (March-May) and autumn (September-November) offer the best weather.

results.title: Best Time to Visit Tokyo - Travel Guide
results.snippet: Cherry blossom season in late March to early April is magical. Autumn foliage in November is equally stunning. Avoid rainy season in June and humid summer months.
